Object Shape: Boomerang, Bullet, Missile, Disc, Fireball, Flash, Saturn-like, Sphere, Star-like, Triangle
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was the night of September,13,2006 when I looked out the window to admire a days work of gardening when I noticed that there was an odd shaped airplane in the sky,when I looked closer,I was shocked! It had an amazingly bright head and was moving remarkably fast.It could have been discribed as a hummingbird because it could hoover in one spot or move in any direction,then I soon realized a plane could never do that. I quickly took out my cellphone and took a picture before it hovered over my house and disappeared. I was not the only witness to this event,my parents were witnesses as well,but after a while they became so scared they regarded it as a figment of their imagination. But I still belive that picture tells a thousand words, and the fright we all expirenced that night. I truly am not a skeptic anymore!
Summary: It turned into various shapes, at first I thought it was an airplane but it started hoovering and it moved in various directions the best way to describe it was "It moved like a Hummingbird".This is because it hoovered then moved back rapidly and so on.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Kitchener
There were no other sightings in Kitchener on or around September 13th 2006
